HPI 8590 Lancia Delta Integrale 16V 1990 Rallye Monte Carlo Winner (Night Version) D. Auriol/B. Occelli

If this car looks familiar, it's the night version of this one from a few posts back. It's part of a special 2-car set (paired with the Celica above). HPI never offered an explanation (that I recall seeing) of why they chose to release this as a special set.
